requirements.summary: Remove the Certifications & Partnerships section from the page entirely, including the component, section heading, placeholder text, and navigation link
acceptanceCriteria: The Certifications component is no longer rendered in App.tsx
No 'Certifications & Partnerships' section heading or content appears on the page
The Header navigation does not contain a link to the certifications section
The rest of the page layout (Header, Hero, Services, Products, AMC, Footer) remains intact and unaffected

file_operations.description: Remove the Certifications component import and remove the <Certifications /> JSX element from the component tree, keeping all other sections (Header, Hero, Services, Products, AMC, Footer) intact
Remove any navigation link that references the certifications section from both the desktop nav links array and the mobile menu navigation items
Delete the Certifications component file entirely as it is no longer needed in the application
